mapper.select: select bl.bingo_letter_id, bl.index, bl.letter, bls.is_check from bingo_letter bl join bingo_letter_status bls on bl.bingo_letter_id = bls.bingo_letter_id join member m on m.bingo_board_id = bl.bingo_board_id where m.member_id = #{memberId};

select bb.required_count, bbs.bingo_count from bingo_board bb join bingo_board_status bbs on bb.bingo_board_id = bbs.bingo_board_id join member m on m.bingo_board_id = bb.bingo_board_id where m.member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.update: UPDATE bingo_letter_status bls JOIN bingo_letter bl ON bls.bingo_letter_id = bl.bingo_letter_id JOIN member m ON m.bingo_board_id = bl.bingo_board_id SET bls.is_check = true WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND bl.index = #{index}
